alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 8:27PM CDT until April 17 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN JONES COUNTY... At 827 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Waynesboro to 8 miles northeast of Ovett to near Macedonia, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Mill Creek and Ovett. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
